definition: to change or replace/to experience/one of the five two-hour periods into which the night was formerly divided/watch (e.g. of a sentry or guard)
to have/there is/there are/to exist/to be

(after a verb or adjective) one who (is) .../(after a noun) person involved in .../-er/-ist/(used after a number or 後|后[hou4] or 前[qian2] to refer to sth mentioned previously)/(used after a term, to mark a pause before defining the term)/(old) (used at the end of a command)/(old) this

sentences.english: More than this, the pope has been given the very titles of Deity.
sentences.chinese: 此外，更有甚者，就是教皇已僭稱了上帝的尊號。

sentences.english: Furthermore, subsidies provide incentives only for investments in equipment.
sentences.chinese: 更有甚者，提供津貼僅是爲鼓勵增添設備的投資。

sentences.english: Furthermore, the cheat who advertises lamb but sells dog meat poisons his customers.
sentences.chinese: 更有甚者，掛羊頭賣狗肉，毒也。

sentences.english: More investment spending implies the use of more sophisticated equipment and machinery.
sentences.chinese: 更有甚者，提供津貼僅是爲鼓勵增添設備的投資。

sentences.english: On top of this, Almaty was prone to earthquakes.
sentences.chinese: 更有甚者，阿拉木圖是地震城市。

sentences.english: More than that, he is a role model: he excels in “managing serendipity”.
sentences.chinese: 更有甚者，他還是一個“善於把握大運”的榜樣呢。

sentences.english: Some even seem to have an incredible appreciation for everyday they have left.
sentences.chinese: 更有甚者，他們天天爲仍然擁有這一天而感謝上蒼。

sentences.english: Someone even assumes that they have the right to waste water because they pay for it so that it has nothing to do with others.
sentences.chinese: 更有甚者認爲自己繳了水費就有權浪費，與他人無關。

sentences.english: Furthermore, at least in Argentina, they require their personnel to work unpaid overtime.
sentences.chinese: 更有甚者，最近在阿根廷，企業要求員工無工資加班。

sentences.english: What's more, about a third of all homes being sold are in some stage of the foreclosure process.
sentences.chinese: 更有甚者，大約三分之一的待售房屋正處在止贖階段。

sentences.english: Furthermore, it may make the emotion mildew and produce fungus, and subsequently prompt the lesions to be occured.
sentences.chinese: 更有甚者，會使感情黴變而生菌，繼而發生病變。

sentences.english: Still others have never considered their own genuine desires.
sentences.chinese: 更有甚者從來沒有去考慮他們自己的願望。

sentences.english: Even more victims die from allergic reactions to bee stings.
sentences.chinese: 更有甚者，一些受害者是對蜂螫傷的過敏反應而死。

sentences.english: What is more, consumers fell annoyed to be interrupted when they are watching TV plays.
sentences.chinese: 更有甚者，消費者覺得看電視劇時插播廣告讓人心煩。

definition: there are plenty of such people
not stint/not spare/not hesitate (to do sth)/not scruple (to do sth)
easily/readily/frequently/at every turn/at the slightest pretext
to call by the glorified name of (idiom)
to link/to join/to connect/continuously/in succession/including/(used with 也[ye3], 都[dou1] etc) even/company (military)
and so on/so and so/many and confused
